4. Literature¶

Below is a list of references that are cited in the libtemplate documentation, namely on this page: [RefLabel1] and [RefLabel2].

RefLabel1

 “Characterizing Topological Order by Studying the Ground States on an Infinite Cylinder” L. Cincio, G. Vidal, Phys. Rev. Lett. 110, 067208 (2013), https://arxiv.org/abs/1208.2623 https://dx.doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevLett.110.067208

RefLabel2

 “Detection of symmetry-protected topological phases in one dimension” F. Pollmann, A. Turner, Phys. Rev. B 86, 125441 (2012), https://arxiv.org/abs/1204.0704 https://dx.doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevB.86.125441
